info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:32PM EDT until July 24 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Broome County in central New York... Southern Cortland County in central New York... Northeastern Tioga County in central New York... Southwestern Chenango County in central New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 431 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lisle, or near Marathon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nanticoke, Coventry, Greene, Oxford, Berkshire, Richford, Cincinnatus, Willet, Whitney Point and Harford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
